content: **embark on a cozy journey through the trees with the into the woodlands mystery knit-along ** this entry gives you full access to the downloadable ad-free pdf versions of all 12 blanket blocks as they are released perfect for those who prefer to knit offline or keep a tidy digital library what s included * 12 original designs high-quality pdf patterns featuring woodland animals and botanical silhouettes * weekly updates new patterns delivered directly to your account every tuesday starting january 20th * beginner-friendly clear charts and row-by-row written instructions knit and purl only * compatibility all blocks are standard oh la lana size 8 75″ making them perfect for mixing and matching > note this is a digital product > patterns will be released over 12 > weeks if you are a member of the > pattern club+ this entry is already > included in your membership language english ------------------------------------------------------------------- **beginner mkal 2026 into the woodlands a 12-week mystery knit-along for beginners** **the project at a glance** theme woodland-inspired animal and botanical silhouettes skill level beginner uses only knit and purl stitches timeline 12 new designs released every tuesday starting january 20th blanket size a 3 x 4 layout creates a cozy baby blanket of approximately 26 25 x 35 67 cm x 90 cm before adding an optional external border **materials & tools** to participate you will need the following - yarn approx 70 yds 64 m of dk 8-ply yarn or 140 yds 128 m of light fingering 3-ply yarn held double for each block this makes a total yarn requirements of **approx 840 yds of dk yarn** for the full 12 blocks > tip choose a smooth yarn with good > stitch definition such as a cotton > blend or a tightly spun wool highly > variegated or fuzzy yarns can hide > the pattern needles us 6 4 mm straight needles for the main work and us 7 4 5 mm straight needle for casting on and binding off to ensure edges aren t too tight notions tapestry needle and scissors gauge 21 sts x 28 row = 10 cm x 10 cm 4 x 4 in stocking stitch using us 6 4 mm needles **block characteristics** each square is designed to be compatible with previous oh la lana collections construction 43 stitches and 63 row total border each block features 4 row of garter stitch at the top and bottom and 4 garter stitches at each side internal canvas the textured design area covers 35 stitches x 55 row finished dimensions approx 8 75 x 8 75 22 5 cm x 22 5 cm per block **how to participate** free option all 12 patterns will be published for **free** on the oh la lana blog pdf entry $4 for those who prefer to knit offline a downloadable pdf version will be available here in my ravelry store every time a clue is released you will receive a notification to download the new pattern >
